name: Xenoparrot Puzzles
description:
Xenoparrot Puzzles is a game about solving puzzles and challenges on alien worlds as a space parrot. You play as a Birx, a cubic bird with amazing problem solving skills. You'll play through 42 levels strewn with new devices and layouts, set in 3 distinct chapters. 

This game also has a timer to keep track of how fast you complete each level, so if you're looking for an easy game to speedrun to mastery Xenoparrot Puzzles could be perfect for you.

The game is currently very early, with many things subject to be changed (especially this description). For now the first 5 levels are done, only 3 of which give real challenges. In addition the hub is still being constructed. Let me know what you think, please, as your feedback could benefit this game greatly.
